actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to prevent the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Amendments of 1984 from affecting pending suits against the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.

summary.text: Provides that pending suits against the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority shall not be affected by specified amendments to provisions relating to liability for compensation made by the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Act Amendments of 1984.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Amendments of 1984 from affecting pending suits against the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.
